summary: MY 2002 FORD ESCAPE XLT STALLED WHILE I WAS DRIVING IT AT 35 MILES AN HOUR.  ALL POWER STOPPED.  THE ENGINE LIGHT, OIL LIGHT, AND BATTERY LIGHT ALL CAME ON.  I HAD MY ESCAPE TOWED TO THE LOCAL FORD DEALER AND THEY EXAMINED IT TODAY.  THEY SAID THAT THEY DID NOT FIND ANYTHING WRONG WITH IT AND THAT THEY WOULD NOT BE ABLE TO FIX IT UNLESS IT STALLED WHILE THEY WERE DRIVING IT.     *NLM
